CustomField.formula: IF(MOD(VALUE(MID(Account.INT_PersonIdent__c,9,1)),2) = 0, 'Kvinne', 'Mann') + ' ' + TEXT(IF(YEAR(TODAY()) - VALUE(Account.HOT_Birthyear__c) >= 100, YEAR(TODAY()) - VALUE(Account.HOT_Birthyear__c) - 100, YEAR(TODAY()) - VALUE(Account.HOT_Birthyear__c))) + ' Ã¥r'
CustomField.label: Gender and Age
